QuestData.Title: Further Treatment
QuestData.Description: Listen, $N. I'm not going to beat around the bush.$B$BThere's a good chance the potion Krennan made for you wasn't a complete success. Or perhaps you need more of it.$B$BEither way, he's probably better equipped to advise you than I am. Go see him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Krennan Aranas in Duskhaven.
